item.description:
Buona sera cari amici!

The much anticipated and the crown jewel of our meetup events is once again here. This marks the 5th Annual Festa di Natale. As in years past, our lovely amica and gracious host Janet will be opening her doors for this festive and joyous occasion.

The event is limited to 40 people and believe me, it will fill up quickly.

In addition to bringing a dish the cost this year will be $5 per person(this covers any incidentals incurred by our host).

Please email Janet with what you will bringing to the party. It is imperative to have some sort of control as to the menu for a party of this size. Also remember to make sure the dish or whatever you bring to eat will serve 10-12 people. Don't forget a bottle of San Pellegirno/Italian soda or whatever you would like to drink.

If the email is not being shown here at the bottom of this write up, Janet is listed as a co-organizer on the upper left of our main page. Click on her name and send her an email. Grazie!

This meetup event will be updated periodically as more details become available. Stayed Tuned!

What you can bring as far as food along with a beverage (vino, San Pellegrino...etc.)

  • Antipasti: Italian cured meats (Prosciutto, soppresatto....etc)
  • Contorni (side dishes): broccoli rabe w/o sausage, insalata, stuffed mushrooms, etc.
  • Primi Piatti (main dishes): Some ideas, Porchetta, baked pasta dish is fine, Chicken Marsala, eggplant parm,,, whatever you can muster up will be fine.
  • Dolci (Desserts): pies, cakes, cookies, canolis - you get the drift :). There will be plenty of espresso, decaf coffee and tea.

If you haven't the time to cook or if it's not your forte, consider bringing the one or two of the following:

  • bottles of wine, San Pellegrino, nuts, chocolate, cheese wedges (may I suggest Grana Padano), crackers to go along with the cheese. Foccacio bread, suffed breads. etc. Limoncello would be nice to finish off our gastronomical affair.

Janet's email address is janetcandela@sbcglobal.net

Her home address will be made public only to those who RSVP "YES", days before the actual event.

Ci vediamo!

Lorenzo
item.name: 5th Annual Festa di Natale - West Hartford, CT
